title: Intensive English Improvement Program Using Mobile-Based Cognitive Apprenticeship Instructional Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and vocabulary proficiency
context.additional_context: Targets learners needing job-readiness English proficiency improvement, offering a blended learning environment combining mobile apps and in-person instruction.

learning_goals: Learners improve their ability to analyze English sentence structures by 30% or more through a mobile app.
Learners acquire English communication skills applicable to real work situations through collaborative learning activities.
Learners improve their confidence in English learning by at least three levels on a five-point scale.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
